content: this design was originally part of the december 2021 jimmy beans wool accessory club cozy up in this combination of a cowl and a shawl for the ultimate cushy comfort crocheted in plump cozy major this cowl will keep you warm even in the chilliest climates it features a deep roomy neck with a stylish pointed front creating an easy to style lovely combination of a shawl and a cowl **difficulty** easy **sizes** one size **finished measurements** circumference 26 length from front 19¼ **materials** **universal yarn** *major* 1 100% acrylic 200g/328 yds 104 pebbles 1 skein hook us size j/10 6 mm or size needed to obtain gauge notions tapestry needle **gauge** 10 half_double_crochet x 8 row = 4 save time check your gauge **pattern notes** this cowl is worked flat from the top down after working even decreases are made to shape the front tip then the sides are sewn together to form the cowl you will work front post double treble_crochet stitches with placements that will create v shapes for a herringbone look this will be referenced in the pattern to help enhance the instructions 1 https //universalyarn com/products/major
